text: Eryka Mondry-Kost (born 18 January 1940) is a Polish gymnast. She competed in six events at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Polish female artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Poland Category:Gymnasts at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Ruda Śląska
title: Eryka Mondry-Kost
